title: Worsh
author: Worsh
created_time: July 19, 2023, 05:50:57 AMLast edit: August 05, 2023, 09:49:31 AM by Worsh
content: âœ… The AI WORDS 20 Million Tokens ðŸŸ  The AI WORDS TOKEN bounty allocation of 20 Million tokens has been successfully distributed by Worsh Bitcointalk team. Therefore, the bounty distribution is completed. You can check your bounty balance. here.Kind Regards,Â  Worsh Bitcointalk Team. Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â   Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  1. The Bounty campaign will be managed by Worsh Bitcointalk.Â 2. 20 Million AI WORDS tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.3. The bounty program was launched on July 19rd, 2023 and will run until August 11th, 2023.4. Worsh Bitcointalk escrows the bounty reward tokens in BEP-20. We don't, however,promise to cover the network fee.1. All participants must join Â AI WORDS TOKEN official Telegram Channel, Â Telegram Group,2. All participants must join Worsh Bitcointalk Telegram Group, Telegram Channel,3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign andan instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Worsh Bitcointalk Bounty Group,4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty programimmediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants with a minimum of 50+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaigns while,8. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address beforeregistration for any campaign.Twitter Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 60%Telegram Â  Â  Â  Â  Â 40%Note: Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter: Â First 150 approved participants.Telegram: First 100 approved participants--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1 (19.07 - Â 26)Week 2 (27.07 - 04.07)Week 3 (05.06 - 11.07)Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules: Â 1. Every participant must follow Â AI WORDS TOKEN Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use $WORDS #AI #WORDS #TOKEN Â hashtags inÂ every retweet or tweet.Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/EyZ6JYChzYhkUwjUARewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to "Your Name | Â AI WORDS TOKEN''. Only one project is allowed in your Telegram name.2. Replace your profile picture with AI WORDS TOKEN Logo. .3. Write at least 5 constructive messages in other crypto-related telegram groups.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful and in a way which will not be considered as spamming.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.6. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.7. You must wear Â AI WORDS TOKEN avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/GWbtavXK2E6L3UKx9
